content:
ContourPointChangeType Enum

Definition

Enumerates values for the types of ContourPoint change.

In this Article

public enum ContourPointChangeType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ContourPointChangeType

Fields

Hz

Indicates a change of the pitch value.
Percentage

Indicates a change of the time value.
